quotes.quote: Expecting is the greatest impediment to living. In anticipation of tomorrow, it loses today.
An intense anticipation itself transforms possibility into reality; our desires being often but precursors of the things which we are capable of performing.
Anticipation, I suppose, sometimes exceeds realization.

By anticipation we sugar misery and enjoy happiness before they are in being. We can set the sun and stars forward, or lose sight of them by wandering into those retired parts of eternity when the heavens and earth shall be no more.
Anticipation leads the way to victory, and is the spur to conquest.
The idea of waiting for something makes it more exciting.
Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
Anticipation was the soul of enjoyment.
Perpetual anticipation is good for the soul but it's bad for the heart.
Anticipation - It's a ticklish thing really, Quivering, exciting, waiting, Until it dies - Killed by it's own self Lost through virtue of being there

Never forget that anticipation is an important part of life. Work's important, family's important, but without excitement, you have nothing. You're cheating yourself if you refuse to enjoy what's coming.
Looking forward to things is half the pleasure of them.
We love to expect, and when expectation is either disappointed or gratified, we want to be again expecting.
We need the sweet pain of anticipation to tell us we are really alive.
Oft expectation fails, and most oft there where most it promises; and oft it hits where hope is coldest, and despair most fits.
It is expectation makes a blessing dear; heaven were not heaven if we knew what it were.
Anticipation is a gift. Perhaps there is none greater. Anticipation is born of hope. Indeed it is hope's finest expression.
Anticipating pain was like enduring it twice. Why not anticipate pleasure instead?
Anticipation is making me late, it's keeping me waiting.
Anticipation makes pleasure more intense.
When you expect things to happen - strangely enough - they do happen.
Live with the anticipation that something incredible might happen at any time.
Anticipation! It occurred to him that his anticipation was more pleasant to him than the experiencing.
Expectation is the mother of all frustration.
Wait for it, wait for it! Anticipation is half the fun, So I've been told...
Anticipation is the greater part of pleasure.
The excitement of anticipation was *almost* equal to the thrill of lovemaking ...
Never yield to gloomy anticipation. Place your hope and confidence in God. He has no record of failure.
Anticipation is sometimes more exciting than actual events.
Somehow the anticipation of pain can be even more troubling, more a misery than the pain itself.
Of all the hardships a person had to face, none was more punishing than the simple act of waiting.
If you come at four in the afternoon, I'll begin to be happy by three.

Engage people with what they expect, it is what they are able to discern and confirms their projections. It settles them into predictable patterns of response, occupying their minds while you wait for the extraordinary moment that which they cannot anticipate.
There is no terror in the bang, only in the anticipation of it.
The reason why most people face the future with apprehension instead of anticipation is because they don't have it well designed!
There are two ways to face the future. One way is with apprehension; the other is with anticipation.
If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
Anticipation of pleasure is, in itself, a very considerable pleasure.
We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements in life, when all we need to make us really happy is something to be enthusiastic about.
I live in the present. I only remember the past, and anticipate the future.
As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation.
Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
Having a dream is what keeps you alive. Overcoming the challenges makes life worth living.
Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences.
This is the precept by which I have lived. Prepare for the worst; expect the best and take what comes.
One of the most delightful things about a garden is the anticipation it provides.
We usually get what we anticipate.
Anticipation and Hope are born twins.

The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
People don't realize that now is all there ever is there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.
Conscience in most men, is but the anticipation of the opinions of others.
He who matures early lives in anticipation.
If pleasures are greatest in anticipation, just remember that this is also true of trouble.
Such is the state of life, that none are happy but by the anticipation of change, the change itself is nothing when we have made it, the next wish is to change again.
Our desires always disappoint us for though we meet with something that gives us satisfaction, yet it never thoroughly answers our expectation.
I have good anticipation, and good reaction to the the ball because I've played so many matches in my life.
The truth is, that no mind is much employed upon the present recollection and anticipation fill up almost all our moments.
Successful investing is anticipating the anticipations of others.
Those who are animated by hope can perform what would seem impossibilities to those who are under the depressing influence of fear.
